title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20": A perfect companion for your next adventure!

Experience the ultimate in convenience and style with this 21-inch hardside underseat luggage. Crafted from impact-resistant and scratch-resistant ABS hard shell, this lightweight suitcase (weighing only 5.62lb) boasts a capacity of 33L and dimensions tailored to fit perfectly under most airplane seats.

Equipped with four silent double spinner wheels, you'll glide through the airport with ease – no more hassle or noise! The TSA lock ensures your belongings remain secure while traveling. Available in a range of vibrant colors, including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple.

Designed for 1-3 day trips, the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage offers durability, functionality, and fashion. The interior features a full capacity design with mesh zip pockets and elasticated compartments to keep your belongings organized.

Upgrade your travel experience with the sleek, stylish, and practical Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" – because every journey deserves the best!

Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - your perfect travel companion for your next adventure! With a sleek and modern design, this hardside luggage is not only stylish but also incredibly functional.

Crafted from durable ABS HardShell material and reinforced with a sturdy steel rod frame, this luggage offers superior protection for your belongings. The 33L capacity provides ample space for all your essentials, while the compact size of 21.85 inches x 8.35 inches x 14.76 inches ensures easy maneuverability in tight spaces and under airplane seats.

Glide through the airport with ease thanks to the 360 degree silent double spinner wheels, allowing you to effortlessly navigate any terrain without disturbing those around you. The TSA lock adds an extra layer of security, giving you peace of mind knowing your belongings are safe during travel.

Available in a range of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, this luggage is not only practical but also a fashionable addition to any wardrobe. The adjustable TPR soft handle with straight handle ensures comfortable transportation, while the lightweight design makes it effortless to lift and carry.

Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, this Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage is suitable for trips lasting 1-3 days. Don't compromise on style, durability, or functionality - make your travel experience unforgettable with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20".

Measuring 21.85 inches x 8.35 inches x 14.76 inches (L x W x H) and weighing only 5.62lb, it's the ideal size for a 1-3 day trip. The high-density ABS hardshell provides excellent impact resistance and scratch resistance, ensuring your luggage stays in pristine condition during transit.

The Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage is equipped with premium 360 degree silent double spinner wheels that make maneuvering through crowded airports a breeze. The TSA lock adds an extra layer of security to protect your belongings.

Inside, you'll find a full-capacity design with elasticated pockets and a mesh zip pocket to keep your essentials organized and easily accessible. The adjustable, stainless steel handle provides maximum comfort during long walks through the terminal.

Don't compromise on quality or style when traveling - choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" for an unforgettable journey!

Available in an array of vibrant colors - Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple - there's a perfect fit for every traveler's taste.
